profileAlternative.name: srimayee madasu
profileAlternative.headline: Team Lead and Java, Python and AWS based Blockchain Developer
profileAlternative.summary: Senior Lead Full Stack Developer with almost 10 years of professional experience in architecting and developing applications for various domains including Healthcare, Retail, Mortgage and Finance. I have expertise in technologies like Cloud, Java, Oracle, Python, Android and Blockchain. With leadership skills and technical expertise combined, I am leading and mentoring teams of different sizes to achieve project success. Strong information technology professional with a master’s in software engineering and computer science.

positions.title: Google FLutter Developer: PharmEasy
positions.description: PharmEasy is a Pharmacy app written using Google Flutter cross platform framework used by customers to refill prescriptions, transfer prescriptions. PharmEasy can be viewed on Android, IOS, Windows desktop, Linux Desktop and Web.
